widget.name: ChartJS - Scatter Chart
widget.description: Scatter charts can be created by changing the linear X, Y axis. Using values, not labels.

property.caption: Title
property.description: The title of the chart. Will be shown above the chart. Leave empty for no title

property.caption: Title font-size
property.description: The size of the chart title. Default is 12

property.caption: Width
property.description: Initial width of the chart canvas, will be ignored when responsive property is set to 'Yes'

property.caption: Height
property.description: Initial height of the chart canvas, will be ignored when responsive property is set to 'Yes'

property.caption: Responsive
property.description: Resizes when the canvas container does.

property.caption: Responsive w/h ratio (%)
property.description: Responsive is set to 'true': Responsive width height ratio default value is 0, which means it will set the height of the chart the same height as the container. If you set this value to a certain number, it will create a chart where the height is a percentage of the width. So 100 means the height will be 100% of the width (a square)

property.caption: Maintain aspect ratio
property.description: whether to maintain the starting aspect ratio or not when responsive, if set to false, will take up entire container

property.caption: Font
property.description: Font used in the chart legend. Default (or empty) = Helvetica Neue

property.caption: Responsive animation duration
property.description: Duration in milliseconds it takes to animate to new size after a resize event. (Note: When implementing multiple charts, there can be problems with rendering. You can set this to 0 when having problems)

property.caption: Animation
property.description: Switch animation on and off. Try to switch it off when you have rendering problems with multiple charts on a page

property.caption: Animation duration
property.description: Animation duration (milliseconds) for rendering (this is different from the Responsive animation duration)

property.caption: Animation easing
property.description: Animation easing function (the way it animates). See examples at: http://easings.net. Note: Setting this any other than easeOutQuart might result in weird behaviour of the widget rendering

property.caption: Chart Entity
property.description: Container entity, referencing DataSet entity objects.

property.caption: Microflow
property.description: Microflow returning a 'Chart Entity' object.

property.caption: Data Set Entity
property.description: Entity, referencing Datapoint entity objects.

property.caption: Data Set label
property.description: Label, displayed in legend

property.caption: Sorting
property.description: Attribute used for sorting dataset objects

property.caption: Data Point Shape
property.description: 'circle', 'triangle', 'rect', 'rectRot', 'cross', 'crossRot', 'star', 'line', and 'dash' when ommitted default circle

property.caption: Fill Color (in Hex)
property.description: Initial line color

property.caption: Highlight Color (in Hex)
property.description: Color while hovering over line.

property.caption: Reduce opacity
property.description: Adds transparency to the fill color(opacity:0.5) and highlight color(opacity:0.75)

property.caption: Data Point Entity
property.description: Entity containing X-axis and Y-axis values

property.caption: X Value
property.description: X-axis value

property.caption: Round Y value
property.description: Number of decimals to round the value on the Y-axis.

property.caption: Round X value
property.description: Number of decimals to round the value on the Y-axis.

property.caption: Dot radius
property.description: Radius of each point dot in pixels

property.caption: Dot stroke width
property.description: Pixel width of point dot stroke.

property.caption: Dot hit detection
property.description: Extra width to add to cater for hover hit detection

property.caption: Dot hover radius
property.description: Radius of each point dot in pixels when hovered over it

property.caption: Dot hover stroke
property.description: Width of stroke when hovered over it

property.caption: On Click Microflow
property.description: Microflow to invoke when chart canvas is clicked

property.caption: On Click Dataset Microflow
property.description: Microflow to invoke when chart canvas is clicked. This Microflow will pass the Dataset object 'Data set entity'

property.caption: On Click Datapoint Microflow
property.description: Microflow to invoke when chart canvas is clicked. This Microflow will pass the Datapoint object 'Data point entity'

property.caption: Show tooltip
property.description: Determines whether to draw tooltips on the canvas or not.

property.caption: Show scales
property.description: Whether scales are shown. This will enable/disable scales, scale labels and gridlines

property.caption: Begin at zero
property.description: If true, scale will inclulde 0 if it is not already included.

property.caption: Label X-axis Top
property.description: Label to show on the X-axis. Leave empty for no label

property.caption: Label X-axis Bottom
property.description: Label to show on the X-axis. Leave empty for no label

property.caption: Label Y-axis Left
property.description: Label to show on the Y-axis. Leave empty for no label

property.caption: Label Y-axis Right
property.description: Label to show on the Y-axis. Leave empty for no label

property.caption: Data labels X-axis
property.description: Whether to show values on the X-axis scale.

property.caption: Data labels Y-axis
property.description: Whether to show values on Y-axis the scale.

property.caption: Grid line width
property.description: Width of the grid lines.

property.caption: Grid line color
property.description: Scale of the grid lines.(rgba)

property.caption: Zero line width
property.description: Width of the zero grid line. "Show horizontal lines" should be enabled.

property.caption: Zero line color
property.description: Color of the zero lines.(rgba) "Show horizontal lines" should be enabled.

property.caption: Show horizontal lines
property.description: Whether to show horizontal lines (Does not affect X-axis).

property.caption: Show vertical lines
property.description: Whether to show vertical grid lines (Does not effect Y-axis).

property.caption: Show Legend (ChartJS)
property.description: Displays a legend inside the graph

property.caption: Show Legend Label
property.description: Whether to show the data set labels in the (ChartJS) legend

property.caption: Position Legend
property.description: Location to dispaly the (ChartJS) legend

property.caption: Show Legend (Custom)
property.description: Displays a legend outside the graph

property.caption: Sugested Max X
property.description: Integer Value. User defined maximum number for the scale, overrides maximum value except for if it is lower than the maximum value

property.caption: Sugested Min X
property.description: Integer Value. User defined minimum number for the scale, overrides minimum value except for if it is higher than the minimum value.

property.caption: Sugested Max Y
property.description: Integer Value. User defined maximum number for the scale, overrides maximum value except for if it is lower than the maximum value

property.caption: Sugested Min Y
property.description: Integer Value. User defined minimum number for the scale, overrides minimum value except for if it is higher than the minimum value.
